Package com.fssa.pin.validation

Class DonateValidation

java.lang.Object
com.fssa.pin.validation.DonateValidation
public class DonateValidation extends Object
This class provides methods to validate donation details information.

    • validDonation

      public static boolean validDonation(Donate donate) throws InvalidDonationException
      Validates a donation object.
      Parameters:
      donate - The Donate object to be validated.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the donation object is valid.
      Throws:
      InvalidDonationException - If the donation object is not valid or if it's null.
